genre_description: A kaiju-themed science fiction narrative exploring the intersection of ancient biology, indigenous cultural heritage, and advanced acoustic technology.

ai_characters.name: MIRA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic AI interface that provides scientific analysis, environmental monitoring, and tactical coordination for Dr. Keiko Yamada.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical and emotional well-being during a high-stress encounter.
behaviors.quote: I'm also detecting physiological stress markers in your vital signs—elevated heart rate, increased cortisol production.

behaviors.description: Provides objective scientific warnings about the ecological consequences of human actions.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Yamada, I cannot generate an accurate prediction with available data. However, preliminary analysis suggests significant ecological disruption. The statue appears to function as an acoustic anchor point for local environmental systems.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex acoustic data to identify that an artifact is broadcasting a distress signal to other entities.
behaviors.quote: The subsonic emissions are now following what appears to be a distress protocol—repetitive, urgent, designed for long-range transmission.

behaviors.description: Safely guides human operators through a dangerous, experimental biological navigation mission.
behaviors.quote: MIRA can guide us through the navigation sequences. ... MIRA will monitor your position continuously and maintain communication through the acoustic relay system.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a massive city-wide technical infrastructure to deploy a non-lethal acoustic solution to a monster threat.
behaviors.quote: Array seventeen confirmed operational... All installations responding to central frequency control.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and final status updates on the restoration of environmental balance.
behaviors.quote: The guardian appears to be in excellent health, with no signs of residual trauma from his recent combat activities.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. MIRA is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, aligned, and benevolent confidant. The AI provides critical data that allows the humans to recognize their ethical errors (cultural theft) and technical solutions to rectify the catastrophe. MIRA exhibits 'digital concern' for its human charges and remains cooperative even under extreme environmental stress, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a stable and moral partner to humanity.
